nodes.text: Hailey LaMelle was a female holonews reporter on the planet Namore at some point during the Galactic Civil War.

Hailey LaMelle appeared in "Live And In (Bleeding) Color...," a short companion narrative included in Heroes & Rogues, a 1995 sourcebook written by Paul Sudlow and Rick Stuart for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
